description: This Java class serves as a factory for creating sample test data objects such as TodoCreateRequest, TodoUpdateRequest, and Todo entities. It provides static methods to generate pre-defined or parameterized test data for unit and integration testing within the Todo backend project.

classes.name: TestDataFactory
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to create sample request DTOs and domain objects for testing purposes.

methods.name: sampleCreateRequest
methods.description: Creates a sample TodoCreateRequest with default values for testing.

methods.name: createRequestWithTitle
methods.description: Creates a TodoCreateRequest with a specified title, used to test different title scenarios.

methods.name: samplePutUpdateRequest
methods.description: Creates a sample TodoUpdateRequest representing a complete update with all fields set.

methods.name: samplePatchUpdateRequest
methods.description: Creates a partial TodoUpdateRequest for PATCH operations, with only some fields set.

methods.name: sampleEntity
methods.description: Creates a sample Todo entity with a given ID, for testing entity mapping and retrieval.
